entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Initial version for resolver for supporting DataContract and DataMember attributes in System.Text.Json #75226
  • Stream.ReadAtLeastAsync and ReadExactlyAsync read an unknown number of bytes when cancelled, no way to recover #75225
  • Vxsort on Windows x64 accessing past the end of the buffer on some runtime tests #75224
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests` are broken on `main` #75223
  • JIT: check/release diff in arm SPMI libraries_tests.pmi #75221
  • Tar: Not able to write a PaxTarEntry from a TarReader. #75215
    7.0.0
  • Out of bounds array access in GC #75214
    7.0.0
  • Repeated commits for mark array #75207
    8.0.0
  • Codegen difference: Local vs IL Stack #75206
    Future
  • why there is lot differences in download speed between framework and dotnet #75203
  • Port redundant warning suppression detection from ILLink to NativeAOT #75201
    8.0.0
  • NO_PROXY: consider matching curl behavior #75199
  • HttpClient - provide timeout per read/write operation in async methods #75188
    Future
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AcceptConnectionFailed #75184
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Some of the System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_XmlResolver tests get stuck on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75183
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777.cmd #75177
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding more IndexOf variations #75175
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Half ToString() bug #75204
  • cgrpoups v2 for dotnet 3.1 #75180
  • Strings with embedded nulls cause issues with event payload decoding #52025
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: password bytes PKCS8 PEM exports #74085
    8.0.0
  • [ThreadPool] OOM during gate thread creation and worker thread creation could stall the thread pool #13437
    8.0.0
  • Fails Reflection to System.Private.CoreLib at Generic method on IIS #75103
  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #74130
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient: An asterisk for wildcards in NO_PROXY is not handled properly #61840
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient Response Stream hangs #74568
    8.0.0
  • Orphaned ReaderWriterLockSlim #12107
    Future
  • Clean up threading tests to make them deterministic and not rely on timing #10420
    Future
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync rethrowing exceptions #75115
    7.0.0
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found #75062
    Future
  • Add constructor with string for SocketException #69266
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory+ExtendedSocketException #37150
    Future
  • Linq IntersectBy() just returns first item on same keySelector #75066
  • [wasm] 'Undefined symbol: arc4random' building Blazor WASM with libsodium #74352
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #74732
    7.0.0
  • UriBuilder should percent-encode its UserName or Password properties #74662
    Future
  • Add more entropy to GetTempFileName() on Windows #73793
    8.0.0
  • Race condition in `DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash` #75041
    7.0.0
  • JIT: morph late canonicalization of assign foils local assertion prop #12098
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish assets immediately and clean some vars #75222
  • Fix the definition of IResourceManagerFactory2. #75219
    area-System.Transactions
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unreferenced cryptographic files #75216
    area-System.Security
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-enable WBT SIMD test on v8, and node #75210
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable Linux/arm and Linux/arm64 JIT rolling builds #75209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update namespace of JsonPolymorphismOptionsTests #75205
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Add new workloads for net8.0 #75200
    area-Build-mono
  • [Android] Avoid using OffsetDateTime on APIs 25 and lower #75196
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75193
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #75192
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix NodeJS build #75187
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Set name .NET SigHandler #75185
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Sample running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #75179
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, blocked, 7.0.0
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75176
    area-System.Transactions
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a perf pipeline issue #75173
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #75172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Remove wbt manifest hack #75197
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove SuperPMI collection of PMI of coreclr tests #75211
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • dummy commit to runtime-extra-platforms.yml to kick the scheduling en… #75217
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make special_sweep_p a per heap member #74625
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Stage spmi aspnet collection through the repo artifacts dir #74879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Ignoring all protocol extension messages that are not supported on .net6 #74836
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.10
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74383
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74366
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #74188
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.x
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places in System.Reflection.Metadata #75135
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of CoreCLR test run #74961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix race condition in DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash #75178
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Support multiple processor groups for NativeAOT #75174
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn compiler build #75156
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #75145
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Disable the GetTotalPauseDuration test #75141
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement TryExportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKeyPem with byte passwords #75161
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid gate/worker thread creation failure stall the thread pool #74791
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix issue with pip install on Alpine #75143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] SIMD related build fixes #75042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Rename `$(WasmSIMD)`, and `$(WasmExceptionHandling)` to `$(WasmEnable*)` #75153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2 for LA64. #75118
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark allocating function in finalizer test as NoInlining #75189
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 6.0.10 #75146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use swizzle instruction for byte vectors #75182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add more vector measurements #75186
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75162
    area-Build-mono
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Make OP_WASM_SIMD_SWIZZLE use the shufflevector LLVM ins… #75057
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix race condition in DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash #75099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support multiple processor groups for NativeAOT #75165
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes instead of open-coded loop in CreateSecKeyAndSecWebSocketAccept #75130
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • [release/7.0][wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 cross containers to ones including pip3 #75167
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Tar: Fix buffer is too small error when writing Prefix on large filenames #75023
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: local assertion prop and redundant zeroing #74967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Drop 6.0.200 workload manifests #74595
    blocked, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add CI job for AOT+SIMD to `runtime-wasm` for PRs #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude segment_standby_list from regions #74975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify installer build by using step container targets #75011
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #75159
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump LLVM to unversioned OSX package names #74996
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [wasm-mt] Fix failing System.Xml tests on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75124
    area-System.Xml
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert "Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. (#74749)"" #75163
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
